projects.name: House-rent
projects.text: A House Rent Management System built to handle data of tenants such as evidence of payments & receipts generation all accessible to the landlord / House Owner.

projects.name: phone-acc
projects.text: A Clone of a Viable E-Commerce Website properly developed to handle user data and purchases such that it enables them to place their orders of the products available on your website.

projects.name: adverts
projects.text: A Full-Stack Developed System that possesses an Intuitive and User Friendly UI for advertising your products to various internet users (potential clients) in the Geo-political Zones of Nigeria allowing them to gain viable access to your services/products.

projects.name: exam
projects.text: A Description Of An Online Examination Platform that helps in generating questions as well as their respective answers in a batch of options which candidates can choose from.

projects.name: blog
projects.text: A Practice System that employs the means of Uploading and Updating Information on Specific Topics, accessible to all internet Users.

projects.name: recruit
projects.text: A Practice Project, This is a Description of a Website where Individuals can reach out to potential Companies for the employment Purposes.

projects.name: roof-sheet
projects.text: A Private Records Keeping System for the PECALUMINIUM Company of the payments of products, customers have purchased from them as well as Receipt Generation for said Products.

projects.name: sales
projects.text: A Fully Developed Sales Management System where all products in a supermarket or business center are recorded with respect to it's registration, purchase of the product, Receipt Generation,etc.

projects.name: school
projects.text: A School Portal Created to handle Student Data such as Student Credentials & Registration, Student Scratch Card, Result Upload and Management using a very responsive Web UI.

projects.name: stud-add
projects.text: A System designed for managing the day-to-day Attendance of University Students to their various Classes for different courses according to their specific departments and faculties.
